original: avalokiteśvarāṣṭakastotram
analyzed: avalokiteśvara aṣṭaka stotram

original: om namo'valokiteśvarāya
analyzed: om namaḥ uvalokiteśvarāya

original: stutvā guṇairanupamairanubindupātraṃ stotraṃ mayā kṛtamidaṃ jaḍavāliśena |
analyzed: stutvā guṇaiḥ anupamaiḥ anu bindu pātram stotram mayā kṛtam idam jaḍa vāliśena

original: lokeśvaraṃ guṇanidhiṃ guṇasāgaraṃ ca nityaṃ namāmi śirasāñjalisaṃpuṭena || 1 ||
analyzed: loka īśvaram guṇa nidhim guṇa sāgaram ca nityam namāmi śirasā añjali saṃpuṭena

original: prāṇeṣu yan sravati yena rasāmbupārān kṣuttṛṣṇaduḥkhaparipīḍitasarvasattvān |
analyzed: prāṇeṣu yan sravati yena rasa ambu pārān kṣudh tṛṣṇā duḥkha paripīḍita sarva sattvān

original: evaṃvidhaṃ jagadidaṃ paripālanāya tasmai namo'stu satataṃ hi yathārthanāmne || 2 ||
analyzed: evaṃvidham jagat idam paripālanāya tasmai namaḥ astu satatam hi yathārtha nāmne

original: satkuṅkumāttamaruṇāṅkasamānavarṇaṃ dvātriṃśalakṣaṇavibhūṣitagātraśobham |
analyzed: sat kuṅkuma āttam aruṇa aṅka samāna varṇam dvātriṃśa lakṣaṇa vibhūṣita gātra śobham

original: sarveṣu yasya karuṇāmayavatsalatvaṃ tasmai namāmi bhavate karuṇāmayāya || 3 ||
analyzed: sarveṣu yasya karuṇā āmaya vatsala tvam tasmai namāmi bhavate karuṇā āmayāya

original: saṃsārasāgaramahālayanāśadakṣa ekastvameva śaraṇaṃ bhuvi naikanātha |
analyzed: saṃsāra sāgara mahā ālaya nāśa dakṣaḥ ekaḥ tvam eva śaraṇam bhuvi nā ekanātha

original: kenāpi tvadguṇagaṇā gaṇane na śakyāstaṃ lokanāthamavalokitanāmasaṃjñam || 4 ||
analyzed: kena api tvad guṇa gaṇāḥ gaṇane na śakyāḥ tam lokanātham avalokita nāma saṃjñam

original: nānāvidhābharaṇamaṇḍitadivyarupaṃ bālendulagnajaṭabhūṣitalokanātham |
analyzed: nānāvidha ābharaṇa maṇḍita divya rupam bāla indu lagna jaṭa bhūṣita lokanātham

original: vāme ca maṇḍaladharaṃ varadaṃ ca savye tvāṃ lokanātha śaraṇaṃ pravrajāmi nityam || 5 ||
analyzed: vāme ca maṇḍala dharam vara dam ca savye tvām lokanātha śaraṇam pravrajāmi nityam

original: brahmādibhiḥ parivṛtaṃ surasiddhasaṃghairgandharvakinnaramahoraganāgayakṣaiḥ |
analyzed: brahma ādibhiḥ parivṛtam sura siddha saṃghaiḥ gandharva kinnara mahā uraga nāga yakṣaiḥ

original: nāthasya yasya bhavataścaraṇāmbujaṃ ca taṃ lokanāthacaraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi || 6 ||
analyzed: nāthasya yasya bhavataḥ caraṇa ambujam ca tam lokanātha caraṇam śaraṇam vrajāmi  /

original: bhūtaiḥ piśācagaruḍoragarākṣasībhiḥ kumbhāṇḍapūtanamahallakarājarājaiḥ |
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ piśāca garuḍa uraga rākṣasībhiḥ kumbhāṇḍa pūtana mahallaka rājarājaiḥ

original: vaiśvānarāsuraśataiḥ parivārabhūtaṃ taṃ lokanāthacaraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato'smi || 7 ||
analyzed: vaiśvānara asura śataiḥ parivāra bhūtam tam lokanātha caraṇam śaraṇam gataḥ asmi  /

original: abdhirdivākarakarairnahi śoṣameti tadvatkavīśvaraśatairguṇasāgaraste |
analyzed: abdhiḥ divākara karaiḥ na hi śoṣam eti tadvat kavi īśvara śataiḥ guṇa sāgaraḥ te

original: lokeśvara prathitakīrtinidhānabhūto na kṣīyate guṇanidhirguṇasāgarasya || 8 ||
analyzed: loka īśvara prathita kīrti nidhāna bhūtaḥ na kṣīyate guṇa nidhiḥ guṇa sāgarasya

original: ślokāṣṭakaṃ pratidinaṃ khalu ye paṭhanti te prāpnuvanti sahasā dhanaputramokṣān |
analyzed: śloka aṣṭakam pratidinam khalu ye paṭhanti te prāpnuvanti sahasā dhana putra mokṣān

original: kuṣṭhādiroganikaraṃ kṣamatāṃ prayāti vandāmahe ca nitarāṃ tava pādayugme || 9 ||
analyzed: kuṣṭha ādi roga nikaram kṣamatām prayāti vandāmahe ca nitarām tava pāda yugme  /

original: śrī āryāvalokiteśvarasya ślokāṣṭakaṃ samāptam |
analyzed: śrī ārya avalokiteśvarasya śloka aṣṭakam samāptam
